name: .NET Framework
description: The .NET Framework is a programming platform and is also a major application implementation platform on Microsoft Windows operating systems developed by Microsoft.

name: Java
description: Java is a general-purpose programming language that is class-based, object-oriented, and designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

name: C#
description: C# (pronounced see sharp, like the musical note C♯, but written with the number sign)[b] is a general-purpose, multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, lexically scoped, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

name: React
description: React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It lets you compose complex UIs from small and isolated pieces of code called “components”.

name: Vue
description: Vue.js (commonly referred to as Vue; pronounced /vjuː/, like `view` is an open-source Model–view–viewmodel JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.
